attributes.action: Keep free prescriptions for 60's and over
attributes.additional_details: The over 60's cannot afford these prescriptions they have worked all their lives, now they are supposed to work till they are 67 who will set an elderly person on. We are entitled to free prescriptions Scotland & Wales don't have to pay at any age
attributes.background: Keep the free prescriptions for the over 60's

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594390
